title: Taurus and Leo Compatibility: Love, Sex, & More

steps.title: Taurus and Leo are fantastic at fulfilling each other's needs.
steps.content: Taurus and Leo are fantastic at fulfilling each other's needs. Taurus is flattered to have Leo's radiant attention, while Leo enjoys having a loyal admirer. These two signs have ruling planets that are close to each other, so these signs are totally comfortable around one another. Taurus is ruled by Venus, the planet of love and money, while Leo is ruled by the sun, the planet of self or life. Taurus likes being with someone like Leo who's passionate and energetic. Leo appreciates being able to profess their love and have it returned.

steps.title: These two signs enjoy a sensual relationship.
steps.content: These two signs enjoy a sensual relationship. Taurus isn’t as sexually driven as Leo, but they’re definitely into physical touch. Fortunately, Leo has no problem getting Taurus in the mood! Leo enjoys PDA and loves to touch, so they're eager to please Taurus. Both signs tend to be assertive in the bedroom. Leo probably finds that being bold and direct warms up Taurus. Taurus can surprise Leo in a good way by initiating sex.

steps.title: Taurus and Leo have a great emotional bond.
steps.content: Taurus and Leo have a great emotional bond. They're both affectionate—Taurus loves nurturing their partner and Leo loves to be admired. Taurus does a great job of telling Leo everything they admire about them and Leo loves showering Taurus with their complete attention. These two understand each other's needs so well that they have a good emotional connection. Taurus and Leo just can't help showering the other with presents. It's their way of expressing their love.

steps.title: A Taurus-Leo couple has solid communication skills.
steps.content: A Taurus-Leo couple has solid communication skills. It probably helps that Taurus is thick-skinned. Leo can sometimes be brutally honest, but Taurus doesn't take it personally. Their main communication challenge stems from the fact that they're both fixed signs. This means that they're stubborn, so they should both learn to compromise. Communication isn't really an issue—it can even become a major strength of their relationship if Taurus and Leo regularly talk about their relationship needs.

steps.title: Both signs base their relationship on honesty.
steps.content: Both signs base their relationship on honesty. Since they're both fixed signs, they're steady in relationships. They tell each other the truth because they respect one another, so their relationship has a solid foundation. Taurus appreciates security in a relationship, while Leo hopes to protect Taurus. A Taurus-Leo couple should also watch out for jealousy. It's easy for both signs to become territorial. [1] X Research source As long as they communicate their feelings for each other, they can avoid being overly possessive. steps.title: Taurus and Leo share similar values and goals, so they can have a successful relationship.
steps.content: Taurus and Leo share similar values and goals, so they can have a successful relationship. They're both looking for stability and loyalty. However, they can be stubborn, too. If this couple can remember what they love about each other, they'll only strengthen their bond. For instance, Taurus can be inspired by Leo's curious nature and desire to explore. Leo can appreciate all that grounded Taurus does for the couple. The Taurus-Leo couple can flex their great communication skills to work out problems whenever they pop up. Like any relationship, a Taurus-Leo couple will have some bumpy challenges at the beginning of their relationship. However, this couple just gets stronger and more sure of each other the longer they're together.
